alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 9:23PM CDT until March 22 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Vincennes and Riverton. .Minor flooding is ongoing across western and southwestern Indiana. Flooding is expected to continue on the Wabash into Thursday. River levels are falling. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Extensive lowland flooding is in progress. High water surrounds many river cabins. Access to most river cabins is by boat only. Levees begin to protect farmland. Extensive flooding of Leaverton Park occurs in Palestine, Illinois. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Wednesday /10:00 PM EDT Wednesday/ the stage was 17.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CDT Wednesday /10:00 PM EDT Wednesday/ was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage early Saturday morning to 14.7 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then rise above flood stage Saturday afternoon to 16.6 feet Sunday evening. It will fall below flood stage again late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
